sn46.42:4.1: “Mendicants, when a Wheel Turning Monarch appears seven treasures appear.
sn46.42:4.3: The wheel, the elephant, the horse, the jewel, the woman, the treasurer, and the adviser.
sn46.42:4.4: When a Wheel Turning Monarch appears these seven treasures appear.
sn46.42:5.1: When a Realized One, a Perfected One, a fully awakened Buddha appears the seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.
sn46.42:5.3: The treasures of the awakening-factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, samādhi, and equanimity.
sn46.42:5.5: When a Realized One, a Perfected One, a fully awakened Buddha appears these seven treasures of the awakening factors appear.”
